entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
